text: A total number of 350 articles were included in this review (see online Additional file 3 for the full list of included articles). Among these articles, 313 were published in Chinese language and 37 were in English; 303 reported descriptive data from surveys and 47 reported on the evaluation of interventions. An increase in the number of MHL-related publications during 1997-2018 in China was seen, growing from 0 in 1997 to 35 in 2018 (Fig. 2a) . The number of papers on interventions for MHL has also increased, particularly since 2014 (n = 11, Fig. 2b) .
